event.name: TechFusion Hackathon
event.description: Join us for an exciting 48 hours of innovation, coding, and collaboration at the TechFusion Hackathon! Bring your creative ideas to life and compete for awesome prizes.

faq.question: Who can participate in the hackathon?
faq.answer: The hackathon is open to students, professionals, and enthusiasts from all around the world.

faq.question: Do I need a team to participate?
faq.answer: You can participate individually or in teams of up to 4 members.

faq.question: What should I bring to the event?
faq.answer: Make sure you have a stable internet connection, your laptop, chargers, and any other tools you might need for coding.

faq.question: How can I contact the organizers?
faq.answer: For any inquiries, you can reach out to us at contact@techfusionhack.com
